title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Introducing the 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set of 16! Perfect for your loved ones - mothers, wives, daughters, and friends. This set includes a variety of delightful scents such as Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia.

Crafted with care, these candles are made from natural soy wax and infused with essential oils, creating a soothing and calming atmosphere in any room. Each candle burns for an impressive 18-20 hours, providing long-lasting enjoyment.

The candles come in convenient tin cans, making them portable and easy to use. Plus, the tin cans are recyclable and can even be repurposed as flowerpots or home decorations, adding a touch of beauty to your space.

Safety is our top priority. Remember to keep the candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

Give the gift of relaxation and tranquility with the 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set of 16. Order now and create a peaceful environment for your loved ones!

Please remember to keep the candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.
